channel.title: Adding Bank
channel.description: When I'm in client.java, and I try to add a bank, I compile and get no errors. I go on to my server after rebooting it and compiling it, and I still don't see the booth. I typed in the proper coordinates. What is wrong?

item.title: Adding Bank
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

You compile BEFORE rebooting.

You may have added the bank incorrectly;

Try this:

  1. Open up client.java
  2. Search for public void NewObjects()
  3. Scroll down to the bottom of the list.
  4. Type makeGlobalObject(CoordX, CoordY, ID, Facing?, 10);//DESCRIPTION
  5. Save, compile, run.

Read full topic
